title: How do i find out ?
body: So, the new honor update is cool, but how do i know how much do i need until the next honor level? Becuse i got in total 7 honors until now and i am still lvl 2, everything could help. Thank you!

replies.body: There is no visible way to tell the progression of your honor level.  Your best bet is to stay consistent, and it will come in due time!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=I57nvPwk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T17:04:01.426+0000)
>
> There is no visible way to tell the progression of your honor level.  Your best bet is to stay consistent, and it will come in due time!

Ty!
That is just odd, you make a progression system and you do not make the progress visible. Okay, thank you!
